name: Radiant Blastoise
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

abilities.name: Pump Shot
abilities.effect: You must discard a {W} Energy card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Torrential Cannon
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t use Torrential Cannon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Radiant Pokémon in your deck.
